name: Lobsterbotomy
description:
As a lobster looking for love, you have no other choice in this human ruled world, but to assume the identity of one of their own. Take control of your human and be careful not to lose control as you attempt to find true love in this strange, strange world.

Ludum Dare page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=125702

Controls

WASD to move
Enter to interact (Enteract ha ha get it?)
M to mute

Make sure your date goes well! If you have a frog in your throat, butterflies in your stomach, or your heart is just beating out of control you won't be able to talk! If you take too long to answer, your date will go poorly.
